response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your business operations. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I estimate its worth to be significantly higher than $1,000,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,250,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and a dedicated support package to ensure smooth integration and optimal performance within your organization. I am confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways, contributing to your company's growth and success. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to discussing this opportunity with you further.", "product_price": 1250000}
